title: Another nice Mexican Blackletter example
content:
This taken about a hour or so south of Ensenada in a rather remote little village near the sea. A larger version can be downloaded on my flicker site: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fontplaydotcom/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018165429/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/fontplaydotcom/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/fontplaydotcom/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018165429im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fp021708-30_4873.jpg)
author: fontplayer
